TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit ActivityValidationServices extends System.Object
public ref class ActivityValidationServices abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供驗證工作流程的功能。

span.span: Provides the functionality to validate a workflow.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Activities.Activity Resolve (System.Activities.Activity root, string id);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Activities.Activity Resolve(class System.Activities.Activity root, string id) cil managed
Public Shared Function Resolve (root As Activity, id As String) As Activity
public: static System::Activities::Activity ^ Resolve(System::Activities::Activity ^ root, System::String ^ id);

param.name: root
param.span: 包含要存取之活動項目的根工作流程活動。

span.span: The root workflow activity that contains the activity element to access.

param.name: id
param.span: 與活動相關聯的識別碼。

span.span: An identifier that is associated with an activity.

summary.span: 在指定的工作流程中擷取含有指定識別碼的工作流程活動。

span.span: Retrieves the workflow activity with the specified ID in the specified workflow.

summary.span: 根據驗證邏輯，驗證工作流程活動已正確設定。

span.span: Verifies that a workflow activity is correctly configured according to the validation logic.

summary.span: 這個邏輯可以是要驗證之活動的 方法，或是建置和原則條件約束。

span.span: This logic can be the method of the activities to validate, or build and policy constraints.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自訂活動作者可以在活動的 覆寫中提供驗證邏輯。Custom activity authors can provide validation logic in an activity's override. 從 擲回的任何例外狀況都不會被視為驗證錯誤。Any exceptions that are thrown from are not treated as validation errors. 這些例外狀況會從 的呼叫中逸出，而且必須由呼叫端處理。These exceptions will escape from the call to and must be handled by the caller.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Activities.Validation.ValidationResults Validate(class System.Activities.Activity toValidate) cil managed
Public Shared Function Validate (toValidate As Activity) As ValidationResults

param.name: toValidate
param.span: 工作流程活動樹狀中的項目。

span.span: An element from a workflow activity tree.

summary.span: 根據驗證邏輯，驗證工作流程活動已正確設定。

span.span: Verifies that a workflow activity is correctly configured according to the validation logic.

summary.span: 這個邏輯可以是要驗證之活動的 方法，或是建置和原則條件約束。

span.span: This logic can be the method of the activities to validate, or build and policy constraints.

returns.span: 驗證錯誤的集合，其中每個驗證錯誤都會包含驗證活動的名稱、描述性訊息、錯誤碼和其他資訊。

span.span: A collection of validation errors, each of which can contain the name of the validated activity, a descriptive message, an error code, and other information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自訂活動作者可以在活動的 覆寫中提供驗證邏輯。Custom activity authors can provide validation logic in an activity's override. 從 擲回的任何例外狀況都不會被視為驗證錯誤。Any exceptions that are thrown from are not treated as validation errors. 這些例外狀況會從 的呼叫中逸出，而且必須由呼叫端處理。These exceptions will escape from the call to and must be handled by the caller.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Activities.Validation.ValidationResults Validate(class System.Activities.Activity toValidate, class System.Activities.Validation.ValidationSettings settings) cil managed
Public Shared Function Validate (toValidate As Activity, settings As ValidationSettings) As ValidationResults

param.name: toValidate
param.span: 工作流程活動樹狀中的活動。

span.span: An activity from a workflow activity tree.

param.name: settings
param.span: 決定工作流程上驗證方法之行為的物件，這個物件可以隱藏內部驗證邏輯，也可以包含原則條件約束。

span.span: An object that determines the behavior of the validation method on the workflow , can suppress the internal validation logic, and can also contain the policy constraints.

summary.span: 根據驗證邏輯，驗證工作流程活動已正確設定。

span.span: Verifies that a workflow activity is correctly configured according to the validation logic.

summary.span: 這個邏輯可以是要驗證之活動的 cacheMetadata 方法，或是建置和原則條件約束。

span.span: This logic can be the cacheMetadata method of the activities to validate, or build and policy constraints.

returns.span: 驗證錯誤的集合，其中每個驗證錯誤都會包含設定不正確之活動的名稱、描述性訊息、錯誤或警告碼和其他資訊。

span.span: A collection of validation errors, each of which can contain the name of the activity that is configured incorrectly, a descriptive message, an error or warning code , and other information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自訂活動作者可以在活動的 覆寫中提供驗證邏輯。Custom activity authors can provide validation logic in an activity's override. 從 擲回的任何例外狀況都不會被視為驗證錯誤。Any exceptions that are thrown from are not treated as validation errors. 這些例外狀況會從 的呼叫中逸出，而且必須由呼叫端處理。These exceptions will escape from the call to and must be handled by the caller.
